tweet: From @chunming_liu: $Eth 2.0 is implementing asynchronous architecture. #IOTA and $NANO are working on DAG-based smart contracts. $EOS is trying to increase TPS while decreasing costs. $Vite has addressed all these issues in a single platform.

@bbands #IOTA with no doubt. A sleepy giant. One of the most undervalued alt & one of the few projects that actually have use cases, huge potential & a pro team. A game changer for #IoT. Feeless, scalable, DAG. Not much else to say, for everything else #DYOR $iota
